info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 06 at 10:32PM CDT until August 06 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN WAYNE AND NORTHWESTERN EDWARDS COUNTIES... At 1032 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Schnell, or 11 miles northeast of Fairfield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cisne, Jeffersonville, Mount Erie and Johnsonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central and southeastern Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
